selectedNotebook.title: Notebook
selectedNotebook.description: This is the notebook you want to use. If you don't have any notebooks, please create one first.

botToken.title: Bot Token
botToken.description: Telegram Bot token. In order to start, you need to create a Telegram bot: https://core.telegram.org/bots#3-how-do-i-create-a-bot. Create a bot with BotFather, which is essentially a bot used to create other bots. The command you need is /newbot. After you choose a title, BotFather will give you the token.

pollingInterval.title: Polling interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: This interval will be used to get new messages from the Telegram bot.

inboxName.title: Postfix added to each message in the daily journal
inboxName.description: This postfix will be added to each message in the daily journal. Replace it if necessary. If you don't want to add this postfix, set this property to blank.

authorizedUser.title: Authorized username from Telegram
authorizedUser.description: Be sure to add your username here, as your recently created bot is publicly findable, and others may send messages to your bot. If you leave this empty, all messages from all users will be processed!

settings.loadError: Error loading settings storage, probably empty config json:

inboxComponent.emptyInbox: Let's send some messages to your Telegram bot!

errors.BotTokenRequiredError: In order to use this plugin, a Telegram bot token is required, set it in plugin settings
errors.InvalidProxyResponseError: Invalid proxy response. Please check your proxy settings.
